title: You and the living machine
brief_description: An animated cartoon which features Jiminy Cricket demonstrating the difference between a living and a manufactured machine. Explains how to take care of the body and portrays the functions of the digestive and circulatory functions.
description: An animated cartoon which features Jiminy Cricket demonstrating the difference between a living and a manufactured machine. Explains how to take care of the body and portrays the functions of the digestive and circulatory functions.
